languages.text: "Толпа черни растерзала благородного человека, пытавшегося их увещевать... Как ужасно. Возможно, подземное безумие распространилось среди них и приняло новую форму, обратив их в чудовищ? Тогда было бы жестоко убивать их за это. Гуманнее совершить над ними мозговое иссечение, благонамеренно умерив их свирепость и склонность к неподчинению. В моем Доме делали так, когда серфы в невежестве своем бунтовали, и это было очень милосердным шагом".

"A mob of commoners mauled a noble soul who was attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane and well-intentioned to excise their brains in order to curb their ferocity and penchant for disobedience. My House did the same whenever the serfs rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."
languages.original_text: "Толпа черни растерзала благородного человека, пытавшегося их увещевать... Как ужасно. Возможно, подземное безумие распространилось среди них и приняло новую форму, обратив их в чудовищ? Тогда было бы жестоко убивать их за это. Гуманнее совершить над ними мозговое иссечение, благонамеренно умерив их свирепость и склонность к неподчинению. В моем Доме делали так, когда серфы в невежестве своем бунтовали, и это было очень милосердным шагом".

traits.locale_text: "A mob of commoner had mauled a noble man who had been trying to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness had spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? Then it would be cruel to kill them because of it. It is much more humane to dissect their brains, well-meaningly reducing their ferocity and inclination to disobedience. It had once been done by my house when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

It had once been done by my house when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: “一群平民居然杀害了试图和他们讲道理的贵族……这实在是太糟糕了。或许地底的疯狂已经在他们之间蔓延，以新的形式爆发出来，将那些人全都变成了怪物？如果是这样的话，那杀死他们实在是太残忍了。更人道的做法是解剖他们的大脑，善意地减少他们的残暴与叛逆倾向。当我的家族麾下的农奴因为无知而造反时，我的家族就采取过这样的解决方式，可以说是相当仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane to dissect their brains in order to well-meaningly reduce their ferocity and inclination toward disobedience. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

traits.locale_text: “一群平民居然杀害了试图和他们讲道理的贵族……这实在是太糟糕了。或许地底的疯狂已经在他们之间蔓延，以新的形式爆发出来，将那些人全都变成了怪物？如果是这样的话，那杀死他们实在是太残忍了。更人道的做法是解剖他们的大脑，善意地减少他们的残暴与叛逆倾向。当我的家族麾下的农奴因为无知而造反时，我的家族就采取过这样的解决方式，可以说是相当仁慈。”

languages.text: «Una turba de plebeyos ha mutilado a un noble que intentaba razonar con ellos... Qué horror. ¿Quizá la locura subterránea se ha extendido entre ellos y ha adoptado una nueva forma, convirtiéndolos en monstruos en el proceso? Sería cruel matarlos si ese fuera el caso. Es mucho más humano disecar sus cerebros para reducir con buenas intenciones su ferocidad e inclinación a la desobediencia. Ya se había hecho una vez en mi casa cuando los siervos se habían rebelado en su ignorancia: una medida bastante misericordiosa».
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane to dissect their brains in order to well-meaningly reduce their ferocity and inclination toward disobedience. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: 「暴徒化した一般人が、自分たちに理を説こうとした貴族の男を襲ったって...なんて恐ろしい。おそらく、地下の狂気が彼らの間に広がり、新しい形を展開して、その過程で彼らを怪物に変えてしまったんじゃないだろうか？もしそうなら、彼らを殺すのは残酷な話だ。彼らの獰猛さと反抗的な思考を有意義に抑えるためには、その脳を解析する方がはるかに人道的だろう。以前、農奴たちが無知ゆえに反乱を起こしたとき...我が一家では慈悲深い措置を講じていたのだ」
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane to dissect their brains in order to well-meaningly reduce their ferocity and inclination toward disobedience. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: « Une foule de manants en colère a mis en pièces un noble qui tentait de les raisonner... mais c'est ignoble ! Peut-être la folie souterraine s'est-elle répandue parmi eux sous une nouvelle forme et les a transformés en monstre ? Si c'est le cas, il serait bien cruel de les tuer... Mieux vaut leur disséquer le cerveau pour réduire leur férocité et leurs penchants à désobéir. C'est ce qu'on a fait chez moi lorsque, dans leur ignorance crasse, les serfs se sont révoltés... et ce fut d'ailleurs fort magnanime de notre part. »
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane to dissect their brains in order to well-meaningly reduce their ferocity and inclination toward disobedience. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

C'est ce qu'on a fait chez moi lorsque, dans leur ignorance crasse, les serfs se sont révoltés... et ce fut d'ailleurs fort magnanime de notre part. »

languages.text: "Ein Mob aus dem Pöbel hat einen Adligen verprügelt, der an ihre Vernunft appellieren wollte ... Wie grauenhaft. Vielleicht hat sich der unterirdische Wahnsinn auf sie ausgebreitet, eine neue Form angenommen und sie zu Monstern werden lassen? Wenn dem so ist, wäre es grausam, sie zu töten. Es ist sehr viel humaner, ihre Gehirne zu sezieren, um aus gutem Willen ihre Wildheit und ihre Neigung zum Ungehorsam zu verringern. Mein Haus hat das einmal getan, als die Sklaven in ihrer Ignoranz rebelliert haben — ein sehr gnädiger Schritt."
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."

languages.text: "Avamdan teşekkül etmiş bir güruh, kendileriyle uzlaşmak isteyen bir soyluyu katletmiş... Ne korkunç. Yer altından doğan cinnet aralarında yayılıp yeni bir hâle bürünmüş, bu vesileyle canavarlaşmalarına yol açmış olabilir mi? Durum böyleyse öldürülmeleri canilik olur. Vahşiliklerini ve itaatsizliklerini dindirmek için beyinlerine cerrahi bir işlem uygulamak çok daha insancıl bir çözüm. Serflerimiz cahillikten ötürü isyan çıkardığında biz de aynısını yapmıştık. Nispeten insaflı bir yaklaşım."
languages.original_text: "A mob of commoners has mauled a noble man who had been attempting to reason with them... How awful. Perhaps the underground madness has spread among them and assumed a new form, turning them into monsters in the process? It would be cruel to kill them if this is the case. It is much more humane to dissect their brains in order to well-meaningly reduce their ferocity and inclination toward disobedience. It had once been done by my House when the serfs had rebelled in their ignorance — a rather merciful step."
